gridjs-vue/autoWidth.description: Boolean to automatically set table width. Default: true

gridjs-vue/classNames.description: Object containing CSS class names. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/cols.description: Array containing strings of column headers. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/from.description: String of HTML table selector or function returning HTML table string. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/height.description: String that sets the height of the table excluding search, pagination, etc. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/pagination.description: Boolean or pagination settings object. Default: true

gridjs-vue/rows.description: Array containing or function returning row data. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/server.description: Server settings object or function returning object. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/sort.description: Boolean activating sort on all columns. Default: false

gridjs-vue/styles.description: Object containing CSS style definitions. Default: undefined

gridjs-vue/theme.description: String with name of theme or 'none' to disable. Default: 'mermaid'

gridjs-vue/width.description: String with CSS width value. Default: undefined
